ygData.subject: Re: Blackened Iron Armor *SPOILER* (sort of)
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, I just had to reply to this, and then I ll let the subject drop forever. Enough has been said about twinking. I have to say, you have to be a real jerk
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, I just had to reply to this, and then I'll let the subject drop
forever. Enough has been said about twinking. I have to say, you have to be
a real jerk to give somebody flak because they are twinked. This is called
JEALOUSY folks. Get over it.


>IMHO someone totally ruined the game for this guy, and he will never even
>know it. Not only has the thrill of the loot been taken from him, among
>other things, *but other players will make his life a hard one because he
is
>twinked.*
>
>-Treehugger and Songmaker
>
>
>
>
